name: Smashy Road: Wanted 2
description:
SMASHY ROAD: WANTED 2

The Award winning game: Smashy Road: Wanted has stepped up it's game!
We present to you: Smashy Road: Wanted 2!

Your are wanted! How long can you stay on the run? Find out in this epic car chasing simulator!

FEATURES
- Open world
- Step in any vehicle you come across
- 30 unlockable vehicles
- 30 unlockable characters
- 6 mystery vehicles
- 6 mystery characters
- Vehicle customisation
- Upgrade your vehicles
- Variating environments
- Procedural generated worlds with chance to encounter secret locations
- All vehicles have their own behaviour. Find your favourite
- Various cool missions
- Online Leaderboards

PLEASE NOTE! Smashy Road is free to play but some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use in-app purchases, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Optimised for iPhone 7 and above.
